sentences.sentence: I rested my fishing rod against a pine bough.
sentences.translation: 我把我的鱼竿靠在松树的一个大树枝上。

sentences.sentence: The Tree trembled so in every bough that one of the tapers set fire to the foliage.
sentences.translation: 枞树的每根枝子都在发抖，弄得一根蜡烛烧着了一根枝子。

sentences.sentence: The pen you bough didn't work.
